casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

September 16, 2008

[Cite as 09/16/2008 Case Announcements #2, 2008-0hio-4681.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2008-1804. State ex rel. Upper Arlington v. Franklin Cty. Bd. of Elections.

In Prohibition. This cause originated in this court on the filing of a complaint for a writ of prohibition involving an expedited election matter. Upon consideration of the motion of Michael A. Schadek for *1457leave to intervene as a respondent,

It is ordered by the court that the motion is granted.
